description.fr:
<if pvm>Confère {PropertyEffect:19} à un allié jusqu'au prochain tour.</if><if pvp>{ARvalue:arPVP,+} à l'allié ciblé.</if>
\---
{#support}\_: <ifpvm>Piochez {SPELLCOUNTvalue:v}.</if><ifpvp>Confère {PropertyEffect:19} à la cible jusqu'au prochain tour.</if>
description.en:
<if pvm>Confers {PropertyEffect:19} on an ally until the next turn.</if><if pvp>{ARvalue:arPVP,+} to the targeted ally.</if>
\---
{#support}: <ifpvm>Draw {SPELLCOUNTvalue:v}.</if><ifpvp>Confers {PropertyEffect:19} on the target until the next turn.</if>
description.es:
<if pvm>Confiere {PropertyEffect:19} a un aliado hasta el próximo turno.</if><if pvp>{ARvalue:arPVP,+} al aliado objetivo.</if>
\---
{#support}: <ifpvm>Sacas {SPELLCOUNTvalue:v}.</if><ifpvp>Confiere {PropertyEffect:19} al objetivo hasta el próximo turno.</if>
description.de:
<if pvm>Macht einen Verbündeten bis zur nächsten Runde {PropertyEffect:19}.</if><if pvp>{ARvalue:arPVP,+} für einen anvisierten Verbündeten.</if>
\---
{#support}: <ifpvm>Zieht {SPELLCOUNTvalue:v}.</if><ifpvp>Macht ein Ziel bis zur nächsten Runde {PropertyEffect:19}.</if>
description.pt:
<if pvm>Concede {PropertyEffect:19} a um aliado até o próximo turno.</if><if pvp>{ARvalue:arPVP,+} ao aliado alvo.</if>
\---
{#support}: <ifpvm>Compre {SPELLCOUNTvalue:v}.</if><ifpvp>Concede {PropertyEffect:19} ao alvo até o próximo turno.</if>
